DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study evaluate impact brief motivational interviewing vs. feedback learning style improve attendance cognitive training
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate whether motivational enhancement improve outcome cognitive rehabilitation Veterans schizophrenia spectrum disorder . Approximately 120 individual randomize either 2-session motivational interview ( MI , experimental condition ) 2-session assessment feedback learning style ( CI , active control ) , ask participate 4 month cognitive rehabilitation . Booster MI CI session administer monthly course cognitive rehabilitation . Primary outcome number cognitive rehabilitation session attend .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis psychotic disorder 18 year old old meeting criterion substance abuse/dependence past 30 day psychiatric hospitalization past 30 day change psychiatric medication past 30 day severe auditory/visual impairment evidence developmental disability
